articles.description: Gold has struggled for more than a week amid rising US bond yields.Analysts say gold rates may be choppy in near term
articles.content: Gold prices fell for the second day in Indian markets with futures on MCX edging lower by 0.25% to 49100 per 10 gram. In the previous session, gold had declined 0.3%. Silver futures on MCX were also … [+3102 chars]
